title: Ginger thins
description: For the competition, Candice made a 3D pub scene out of gingerbread and biscuits. This recipe is just for the delicious ginger thins used to make the people and pub furniture.For this recipe you will need a 5—6cm/2—2½in biscuit cutter, two large baking trays and a cooling rack.
ingredients: 50g/1¾oz stem ginger in syrup, finely chopped
3 tbsp syrup, from the stem ginger
